text: Winston Maxwell "Max" Keeping (April 1, 1942 - October 1, 2015) was a Canadian broadcaster and philanthropist. He was CJOH-DT vice-president of news and public affairs. CJOH-DT is the CTV station in Ottawa, Ontario. He was an anchor for the station from 1972 until his retirement in 2010. Keeping was born in Grand Bank, Newfoundland. He died from cancer in Ottawa, aged 73. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Canadian journalists Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Cancer deaths in Ontario Category:Order of Canada Category:People from Newfoundland and Labrador
title: Max Keeping
